Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28736 affecting package grub2 for versions less than 2.06-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-28736 affecting package grub2 for versions less than 2.06-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package grub2 is earlier than 2.06-12, affected by CVE-2022-28736
